name: Backpack Straps of Preparation
description: The most comfortable straps available.

name: Copper Harvesting Sickle
description: Used to gather Blueberries, Button Mushrooms, Onions, Carrots, Herb Seedlings, Potatoes, and Lettuce.

name: Copper Logging Axe
description: Used to chop down Aspen Saplings, Kertch Saplings, and Ekku saplings.

name: Copper Mining Pick
description: Used to mine Copper Ore.

name: Incarnate Light Shoe Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other light boots.

name: Mini Llama
description:
Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.
Combine 3 Mini Llamas with an Essence of Llamatic Elegance in the Mystic Forge to make a Mini Fancy Llama.

name: Scarlet's Veil Skin
description: Double-click to imbue another helmet item's stats into this appearance (one-time ability).

name: Minis 3-Pack (Set 3)
description: Double-click to receive 3 randomly selected Minis (2 common and 1 uncommon) to add to your collection.

name: Glowing Crimson Mask
description: Double-click to imbue another helmet item's stats into this appearance (one-time ability).

name: Strider's Medium Armor Skin
description:
This full set of medium armor skins can replace the appearance of medium armor pieces, once per slot. The skins will also be unlocked in your account wardrobe.

Skins have no stats of their own.
Can only be used by characters who wear medium armor.

name: Permanent Guild Shield Finisher
description: Display your guild's emblem when finishing off a foe.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other longbow.

name: Lawless Helmet Skin
